author: Dana Howl
description:
Head to https://squarespace.com/danahowl to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain using code DANAHOWL

In this video I take you on a journey from tiny sketch, to publishing my very first illustration in the tabletop gaming industry, for the game GRAVE TRIGGER
Grave Trigger: https://gamefound.com/en/projects/cardboard-dynamo/grave-trigger

My Website: https://howlcorp.com
Support Me on PATREON: https://patreon.com/danahowl

Links to books on how to draw:
(note, these are amazon affiliate links, I earn a commission at no cost to you):
Drawing on the Right Side of the Brain (best overall book on drawing)
https://amzn.to/4jvu0RJ
Perspective Made Easy (best book on perspective drawing)
https://amzn.to/4qBRaZ6
Drawing Scenery: Landscapes and Seascapes (best book for landscapes)
https://amzn.to/3LlhYxH
The Five C’s of Cinematography (best book on cinematic composition)
https://amzn.to/4smpeKc

title: Miniature PAINTER... Become Illustrator???
